title: Looking for Victorian home with a large apartment for rent
description:
Check out this stunning turn of the century Victorian home with a large apartment for rent. Conveniently located in the center of Lansdowne just a short walk to shops/restaurants, regional rail(5min walk), and Aldi grocery store. Heating electric and hot/cold water are paid by the landlord while the tenant is responsible for their cable/internet. One large A/C unit is included and keeps the main floor cool during the summer months. Heat is provided from cast iron radiators, which have been balanced throughout the property, with decorative covers.As you approach your new apartment you'll be greeted by a property with a ton of character with its stunning color, spacious front porch, private yard, and a grand turret. Some of the unique features include a beautiful open staircase, large rooms throughout with 10ft ceilings, very well appointed kitchen, two full bathrooms, and lots of windows for natural light.
The front yard has plenty of room to play catch/soccer or for your furry family members to lounge in the sun while you enjoy coffee from the huge wrap around front porch. You won't need to carry keys with you as this apartment has a digital lock on the front door. Inside the front door is a posh foyer and a grand open staircase with beautiful woodwork.
The main floor includes large living room large dining room kitchen and a full bathroom. You won't find a better appointed kitchen in an apartment with tons of counter space, glass top stove and dual ovens. The kitchen also features a bar height table that seats five and hardwood floor. The dining room has plenty of space to host family and friends for dinner parties and features a bay window overlooking Owen Ave. A spacious living room has enough space for a large TV and several couches so the whole family can enjoy a movie night together. An additional turret room with built in shelving for photos books or trinkets and 270 degree view of the neighborhood.
The master bedroom is absolutely huge with plenty of closet space and includes the 3rd floor turret where you can see 270 degrees over the entire neighborhood. Two additional bedrooms are quite large and have more than enough room for queen/king size bed plus additional furniture. A second full bathroom is at the end of the hallway with free laundry facilities tucked into a room off the bathroom.
If you would like a tour of the apartment please submit an application. Tours will not be scheduled until an application is submitted, this shows you are qualified and serious about renting the apartment.
1 year lease, longer lease terms are available. $2100 security deposit and signed lease to secure the apartment. First months rent due at move-in and on the 1st each following month. Rent can be paid via personal check or electronically.
ALL utilities are include. Cable/internet are tenant's responsibility, Comcast and Verizon Fios available.If interested, please call the number attached to this listing.
